item.title: Patent Analysis Using R
item.description: I created this blog to showcase the my learning efforts in data science, statistics and especially R programming. Studying R, I found it much easier to practice the language by applying it to real-world datasets instead of textbook examples. The first dataset I use for some experimentation is the OECD Triadic Patent Families Database. This dataset provides endless possibilities for quantitative analyses in the realm of innovation studies and intellectual property statistics.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
